item.description:
UPDATE:  Individual Tickets are sold out. Only available tickets are by booking dinner at clink $50.00 plus $30.00 ticket (call 617-224.4004) or with hotel package. Ticket availability for this event is limited as it approaches a sellout. If you are attending please update your RSVP, answer the ticket purchase question and purchase your ticket from the Liberty Hotel web site.

Many Natives spooked by the scary 2012 Red Sox season have asked for a Halloween Party so we have picked one.

If you are a procrastinator buying tickets, are cheap, can not afford to pay $30.00 for a special event or want to get drunk on cheap drinks all night this event is NOT for you.

If you are up for partying on a Saturday night in a former prison with three levels of entertainment, live aerial performers, Three DJs ( DJ Hectic, DJ7L and Michael Savant) and other surprises then this event is for you.

Join us as The Liberty Hotel presents Alfred Hitchcock's "The Birds" their Annual Halloween Costume Party from 8:00pm to 2:00AM.

Expect a lot of wild costumes. Will Wonder Woman be able to save us all from the Birds?

This is a 21 plus event with proper ID required.

Warning: For multiple ticket purchases all parties must be present to enter.

YOU MUST PURCHASE A TICKET ON LINE FROM THE LIBERTY HOTEL IN ORDER TO ATTEND. TICKETS ARE ALREADY 70% SOLD OUT! PLEASE PURCHASE YOUR TICKET NOW OR BY OCTOBER 8th AND THEN RSVP TO THE NATIVES.

We will E Mail ticket holders to meet and possibly arrange optional nearby dinner before the party.

For more info www.libertyhotel.com

For TICKETS:http://www.showclix.com/event/thebirds

This will be a long night so be prepared for...?
item.how_to_find_us: We will e-mail those who have purchased tickets before the event. Arrive for early line entry by7:45pm
item.name: Annual Halloween Costume Party at Liberty Hotel Alfred Hitchcock's "The Birds"
